multiverseText1: The Inception Packages are RCM's Deluxe Collectible Starter Boxes that multiply into six (or more) character NFTs and trading card NFTs and more
multiverseText2: They come jam-packed with in-game assets and actually multiply into six (or more) NFTs that you get to choose when you begin gameplay.
collectionAdvertTitle: A collection built with utility & community at the foundation
collectionAdvertDescription: Each Inception Package is a collection of in-game assets, and each type of Inception Package will provide you with different levels of rarity for those resources. Remember two things: both characters and play cards are NFTs and both will be chosen by you at the launch.
collectionAdvertComment: IF YOU'VE GOT YOUR EYE ON A RARE OR LEGENDARY INCEPTION PACKAGE, YOU MIGHT WANT TO ARRIVE TO THE PARTY EARLY.
applyRCMFellowship: Apply for the RCM Fellowship to get early whitelist access to the icNFT launch.

ownerReward.title: ALL INCEPTION PACKAGE OWNERS ALSO RECEIVE:
ownerReward.iconVideo: Lower third RCM-branded graphic for video
ownerReward.iconRedCat: 3D printing file (stl) of Sanura, the Red Cat (drm-free)
ownerReward.text: Exclusive access to RedCat Multiverse Private Beta Phase Inception

multiverseGate.title: THE PORTALS OPEN LAUNCH EVENT
multiverseGate.text1: Are you excited to join the multiverse as soon as possible? You’ll have your chance with our LIMITED collection of Inception Packages!
multiverseGate.text2: Each Inception Package is one-of-a-kind, featuring variations of our very own Red Cat, Sanura. In addition to being able to appreciate it in your wallet and use it as your PFP, each Inception Package includes all of the character NFTs and in-game resources you’ll need to start playing the game upon launch.
multiverseGate.text3: As an Inception Package holder, you’ll also have exclusive access to early play during the RCM Private Beta: Inception.

faq.question: What is the RedCat Multiverse?
faq.answer: RCM Labs is creating a brand new concept with the world’s first  Play, Learn and Earn (PLE) model within a highly engaging blockchain gaming economy. The Red Cat Multiverse is a community-first and operated decentralized NFT collection utilized in arena-style challenges and story-based adventure campaigns, cooperative matches  through a variety of times, places, and parallel universes.

faq.question: What are character NFTs?
faq.answer: Characters are the main assets players use to interact with the game, each with proof of ownership stored on blockchain.

faq.question: How many characters will be created?
faq.answer: The most important and valuable NFTs in the RedCat Multiverse are characters. The initial release will include 104 characters, growing to more than 160 over the next 18 months. There will be a limited supply of these characters.

faq.question: How are Play & Trading Cards NFTs?
faq.answer: Play and Trading Cards will be minted on ERC-1155, meaning that you can own multiple of the same card. This allows you to customize your strategy as you see fit.

faq.question: When will the first NFTs be launched?
faq.answer: The first batch of NFTs will be minted in Q4 by Inception Early Adopters.

faq.question: How can I purchase Inception Packages?
faq.answer: All NFTs can be purchased with ETH directly from www.redcatmultiverse.io

faq.question: How much do Inception Packages cost?
faq.answer: Pricing details for Inception Packages will be announced at a later date.

faq.question: Who’s the creator?
faq.answer: The thought leadership behind this project features some of the top minds in the industry including alumni from MIT and Stanford as well as Algorand and Riot Games. RCM Labs is working with some of the foremost experts in game theory and Web3 technology to ensure that this game meets the expectations of our growing online community.
